Line1.1040BD: Did my father send you? He never responded to my last letter, and I've been worried.
Line11.1040BD: I was going to come home. After I'd saved up enough gold to move him somewhere nicer. Somewhere he didn't have to work so hard.
Line13.1040BD: Thank you for returning this to me.
Line9.1040BD: My doll. Father kept it. We argued just before I left. He felt it was too dangerous becoming a mercenary. But so was mining in that area.
